Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 44th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Anthony Saulters (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2019, off Dwayne Garner (MIL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York on 6/13/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2019, hitting .552 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2019...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/2/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Oakland on 4/28/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
